verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to her that is filthy <S%H4754><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and polluted <S%H1351><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, to the oppressing <S%H3238><s%> <S%H8802><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> !

She obeyed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the voice <S%H6963><s%>; she received <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not correction <S%H4148><s%>; she trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not in the YY <S%H3068><s%>; she drew not near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to her 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> her are roaring <S%H7580><s%> <S%H8802><s%> lions <S%H738><s%>; her judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> are evening <S%H6153><s%> wolves <S%H2061><s%>; they gnaw not the bones <S%H1633><s%> <S%H8804><s%> till the morrow <S%H1242><s%>.

Her prophets <S%H5030><s%> are light <S%H6348><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and treacherous <S%H900><s%> persons <S%H582><s%>: her Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> have polluted <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, they have done violence <S%H2554><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the Torah <S%H8451><s%>.

The just <S%H6662><s%> YY <S%H3068><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> thereof; he will not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>: every <S%H1242><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> doth he bring <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his judgment <S%H4941><s%> to light <S%H216><s%>, he faileth <S%H5737><s%> <S%H8738><s%> not; but the unjust <S%H5767><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> no shame <S%H1322><s%>.

I have cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>: their towers <S%H6438><s%> are desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; I made their streets <S%H2351><s%> waste <S%H2717><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, that none passeht by <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: their cities <S%H5892><s%> are destroyed <S%H6658><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, so that there is no man <S%H376><s%>, that there is none inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Surely thou wilt fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me, thou wilt receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%>; so their dwelling <S%H4583><s%> should not be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, howsoever <S%H834><s%> <S%H3605><s%> I punished <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them: but <S%H403><s%> they rose early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all their doings <S%H5949><s%>.

Therefore wait <S%H2442><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye upon me, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, until the day <S%H3117><s%> that I rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to the prey <S%H5706><s%>: for my determination <S%H4941><s%> is to gather <S%H622><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, that I may assemble <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, to pour <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon them mine indignation <S%H2195><s%>, even all my fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>: for all the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my jealousy <S%H7068><s%>.

For then will I turn <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> a pure <S%H1305><s%> <S%H8803><s%> language <S%H8193><s%>, that they may all call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him with one <S%H259><s%> consent <S%H7926><s%>.

From beyond <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> my suppliants <S%H6282><s%>, even the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my dispersed <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, shall bring <S%H2986><s%> <S%H8686><s%> mine offering <S%H4503><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for all thy doings <S%H5949><s%>, wherein thou hast transgressed <S%H6586><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me: for then I will take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> out of the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee them that rejoice <S%H5947><s%> in thy pride <S%H1346><s%>, and thou shalt no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> be haughty <S%H1361><s%> <S%H8800><s%> because of my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

I will also leave <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee an afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and poor <S%H1800><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, and they shall trust <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, nor speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>; neither shall a deceitful <S%H8649><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>: for they shall feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and lie down <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and none shall make them afraid <S%H2729><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>; shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and rejoice <S%H5937><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with all the heart <S%H3820><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> hath taken away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>, he hath cast out <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thine enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, even the YY <S%H3068><s%>, is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee: thou shalt not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> any more.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou not: and to TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, Let not thine hands <S%H3027><s%> be slack <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee is mighty <S%H1368><s%>; he will save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, he will rejoice <S%H7797><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over thee with joy <S%H8057><s%>; he will rest <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in his love <S%H160><s%>, he will joy <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over thee with singing <S%H7440><s%>.

I will gather <S%H622><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them that are sorrowful <S%H3013><s%> <S%H8737><s%> for the solemn assembly <S%H4150><s%>, who are of thee, to whom the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of it was a burden <S%H4864><s%>.

Behold, at that time <S%H6256><s%> I will undo <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> all that afflict <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee: and I will save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her that halteth <S%H6760><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8762><s%> her that was driven out <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; and I will get <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them praise <S%H8416><s%> and fame <S%H8034><s%> in every land <S%H776><s%> where they have been put to shame <S%H1322><s%>.

At that time <S%H6256><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> you again, even in the time <S%H6256><s%> that I gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8763><s%> you: for I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you a name <S%H8034><s%> and a praise <S%H8416><s%> among all people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, when I turn back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> your captivity <S%H7622><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
